sourcesContent:
<!-- eslint-disable max-len -->
<!-- eslint-disable vue/no-multiple-template-root -->
<!-- eslint-disable vuejs-accessibility/label-has-for -->
<template>
    <label class="colors__label" :class="{done: kolor.done}" v-for="kolor in kolors" :key="kolor.text">
        <input type="checkbox" v-model="kolor.done">
    </label>
</template>

<script>
export default ({
    data() {
        return {
            message: 'Hello Vue!',
            kolors: [
                { text: 'White', done: true },
                { text: 'Black', done: false },
            ],
        };
    },

    methods: {
        addTask() { this.push({ text: this.message, done: false }); this.message = ''; },
    },
});
</script>
